description.value:
Prerequisite(s): None
Range: Melee or ranged attack
Target: One creature
Duration: 1 round

Description

You single out a single target for execution. Make an attack. If it hits, the attack deals no damage. The next damaging attack made against the target by the initiator or her allies within 1 round deals 50% additional damage, applied after all other eﬀects (such as damage reduction and energy resistance). Essence: The first attack made against the target within 1 round deals an additional 2 points of damage for each point of essence invested into this boost. This damage is eligible to be increased by the eﬀect of the boost.
